snippet: Whether it is finding a deal, staying abreast of reservations or figuring out where to go when you arrive, Web sites and apps can put an army of travel agents, concierges and local experts in your pocket.
abstract: Seasoned business travelers are increasingly using Web services and mobile apps that allow them to find deals, stay abreast of reservations and figure out where to go when they arrive at their destinations.
lead_paragraph: Whether it is finding a deal, staying abreast of reservations or figuring out where to go when you arrive, Web sites and apps can put an army of travel agents, concierges and local experts in your pocket.

headline.main: Apps That Do Everything but Pack Your Bags
